DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 : SEMIFINALS ; SPOTLIGHT ; RAIDERS OF SOCCER
DOC.TEXT: The main headline read : " Brazil Gets Ready to Suffocate the Swedes. " And under another headline , " Bulgaria : Sex , Cigarettes and Sometimes Football , " Jorge Luiz Rodrigues wrote in O Globo in Rio de Janeiro : " They love parties , long nights and shopping . Most drink and smoke . And , once in a while , they practice. "
